title: Tasty Sexy Mexy Recipes
description: My favorite Mexican recipes are included in this cookbook. These basic recipes are simple to make. My special Chile Colorado sauce is very good, it's my Mama recipe. Believe me everyone loves it. People don't know how important that little recipe is. It makes the dish. For most of them, oops don't tell them, lmao!My special red Chile sauce creates delicious Enchiladas, Chile Colorado, Pozole and more! Enjoy!Patricia â™¥
author: P.T. Macias
